Welcome in Vocabulary For You. The voc4u have three options.
#1: Train is the main and there you can improve memory of vocabulary, for examle in public transport.
#2: Speaker mod is about, vocabulary to speech and you can only listening, for examle when you go to bet.
#3: For otherwise here is mode for trying pronunciation, the Phone listening you and comparing with the regular word.

Here you can train the your vocabulary. Two button "know" and "don't know" do display to you next word, but when use the "don't know" the word will be show more frequently. Words in Train you can manage in Dictionary access from options menu.
On this form you can select the lesson for your training. Any lesson have example with words which contain.
